name: My Games Companion (Dead by Daylight and Overwatch)
name_original: My Games Companion (Dead by Daylight and Overwatch)
description:
This application is a game companion for multiple games. At the beginning, it's a personal project, but I decided to share it with you.  For the moment, there is only a Dead by Daylight's and Overwatch game companion (perk builder and team manager).  Future updates will allow to add new games and new features. Don't hesitate to put suggestions in the comments.

Dead by Daylight Features:

  • Create survivor and killer perk builds,
  • Save all your builds in one place,
  • See all perks on one page,
  • Create survivor and killer random build.

Overwatch Features :

  • Create and register your team members,
  • Assign role for each member.

Updates:

  • New survivor (Yoichi Asakawa) and killer (Onryo) perks added,

Notes :

  • Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
